description: This cluster provides a standardized way for a Node (typically a Bridge, but could be any Node) to expose • Information about logical grouping of endpoints on the Node (example: lights in a room) • Information about named actions that can be performed on such a group of endpoints (exam­ Matter Specification R1.3                        Connectivity Standards Alliance Document 23-27349 April 17, 2024
